in_ports.description: DRange value of output when input is true.

members.name: false_value

members.description: DRange value of output when input is true.
members.name: true_value

out_ports.description: Float with value set on options or via value_set ports.
out_ports.name: OUT

out_ports.name: OUT

converter.author: Intel Corporation
converter.description: Receives a string packet and convert it to boolean.

out_ports.name: OUT

converter.description: Receives a string packet and convert it to float.

out_ports.name: OUT
